CodeWave Hub:

2023 Edition

Join us as we celeBRATE THE 10 AniveRSARY OF hacktoberFest

October 18-19, 2023

What is
HacktoberFest?

Hacktoberfest is an annual event that encourages people to contribute to open source throughout October. Hacktoberfest is all about giving back to open-source projects, sharpening skills, and celebrating all things open source, especially the people that make open source so special. Thousands of peopleâ€”coders and non-coders alikeâ€”have participated in hacktoberfest to support the projects they use and love, learn and practice skills that will enhance their careers, and meet new people who love open source as much as they do.

CodeWave Hub: HacktoberFest 2023

The CodeWave Hub HacktoberFest 2023 Edition, is being organized for 2 days to introduce students and aspiring developers to the exciting world of open-source contributions and web development. It aims to provide attendees with practical knowledge and hands-on experience in these domains. In this immersive learning experience, we will demystify the world of open source, Git & GitHub & web development, providing insights into its significance and guiding them through the process of finding and contributing to open-source projects.

Event Details

18 & 19 October 2023

What to Expect

01 Valuable Talks

Learn from well-known industry experts

02 Workshop

Engage in a hands-on learning experience, where you acquire knowledge to make your First open-source contributions.

03 Networking Channels

Opportunities to chat with fellow creatives
